name: MOHAMAD SYALVA SYALABI ROSYIDY
aboutMe: Hello, my name is Mohamad Syalva Syalabi Rosyidy, commonly known as Syalva. I have accumulated over 4 years of experience as a Software Developer. Besides focusing on software development, I also have a background in Cloud Computing, Chaos Engineering, Digital Marketing, Teaching, and Graphic Design.

Regarding certifications, I take pride in holding more than 14 Cloud Computing certifications from various vendors, demonstrating my in-depth understanding of cloud technology. Additionally, I also hold 2 Chaos Engineering certifications, reflecting my specialized skills in managing and testing system resilience against disruptions.
